activities: Valley Data Services, LLC is a data supplier based out of Scottsdale, AZ in the United States.  We specialize in communications data that includes SMS, Cellular Phone numbers, Fax numbers and opt in email services for marketing purposes, promotions, research and education.  Our company compiles and distributes (buys, sells and trades) this specific information which is transmitted both on line as well as off line.  What our company is seeking to accomplish under the safe harbor agreement is to protect the data that we buy from our clients and sell to our customers
eucountries: France, Germany, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
We commit to cooperate with 
Data Protection Authorities
 located in the European Union.
